roleset.name: give a plea in court, misspelling of plead?
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to plea-n.01 and plead-v.02.

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: Drexel therefore agreed instead to an arrangement allowing it to plea to charges "which the company is not in a position to dispute" because of RICO.
example.arg: to charges "which the company is not in a position to dispute" because of RICO.
